description: [Raccoon Stealer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1148) queries the Windows Registry to fingerprint the infected host via the `HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Cryptography\MachineGuid` key.(Citation: Sekoia Raccoon1 2022)(Citation: Sekoia Raccoon2 2022)

external_references.description: Pierre Le Bourhis, Quentin Bourgue, & Sekoia TDR. (2022, June 29). Raccoon Stealer v2 - Part 2: In-depth analysis. Retrieved August 1, 2024.
Quentin Bourgue, Pierre le Bourhis, & Sekoia TDR. (2022, June 28). Raccoon Stealer v2 - Part 1: The return of the dead. Retrieved August 1, 2024.
